short_summary: The RCMP requires all labour, materials, equipment, transportation and daily site supervision necessary to provide janitorial services in accordance with the Invitation to tender and Annex "A" - Janitorial Services, for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) Boissevain Detachment in Manitoba during the period of the contract.
description: The contract duration will be for two years from the date of contract with an irrevocable option to extend it for up to three additional one-year periods
